statements: DELETE FROM sentencing_disparities WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith';
DELETE FROM sentencing_disparities WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith' AND sentence_duration > 10;
DELETE FROM SentencingHistory WHERE prior_sentencing_history LIKE '%prior history%';
DELETE FROM SentencingHistory WHERE sentencing_judge = 'Judge Smith' AND previous_convictions > 5;
DELETE FROM defendants WHERE age > 50 AND race = 'White';
DELETE FROM cases WHERE case_type = 'Criminal' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM defendants WHERE age > 30 AND race = 'White';
